TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中提供从 类派生的控件的设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记的描述的控件派生自类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，则设计时控件是保留到标记源和编辑代码向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page. 派生自的设计器抽象基类的派生自的控件提供设计时支持类。Designers that are derived from the abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造一个派生自的设计器的新实例类创建关联的控件的设计图面上时。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，一般会从上一个数据源卸载事件，然后将新事件附加到新数据源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.

returns.span: 如果执行了与新数据源的连接（通常是这种情况），则为 ；如果新旧数据源相同，则为 。

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; if the old and new data sources are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现方法通常涉及将其解除挂钩事件从以前的数据源，然后将新事件附加到新的数据源。The implementation of the method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，为关联 对象创建新的数据源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关的示例替代显示一个对话框，可用来创建数据源关联的控件，请参阅。For an example of a override that displays a dialog that can be used to create a data source for the associated control, see .

para.span: 重写方法以提供一种创建关联的控件在设计时的对象。

span.span: Override the method to provide a means of creating a control for the associated object at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

span.span: The with which this designer is associated.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，执行必要的操作以设置从 类派生的关联控件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你重写方法在设计器中派生自类中，执行必要的操作以设置数据绑定控件，以便检索设计时标记时，该控件正确呈现。When you override the method in a designer that is derived from the class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly. 通常情况下，你会将关联的设计时数据源，而不是实时数据源，出于性能原因。Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置关联控件的 属性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property for the associated control.

value.span: 由 派生的关联控件使用的数据绑定表达式。

span.span: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于隐藏属性与此设计器关联的类。The property is used to shadow the property of the class that is associated with this designer. 值属性保存由设计器为基础生成的标记上的数据绑定表达式对象。The value of the property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSourceID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置基础 对象的 属性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property of the underlying object.

value.span: 与基础 关联的 的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the associated with the underlying .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于隐藏基础属性对象。The property is used to shadow the property of the underlying object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisconnectFromDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，从当前数据源卸载事件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, unhooks events from the current data source.

para.span: 通常情况下，当你重写方法，将断开连接和事件。

span.span: Typically, when you override the method, you will disconnect the and events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为所有数据源事件从设计器将解除挂钩的事件处理程序。The method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 生成用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.

returns.span: 用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类检索用于在设计时呈现控件之前绑定目的的示例数据。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 如果控件不是绑定的数据，则会调用方法。If the control is not data bound, it calls the method. 如果没有错误呈现控件，则会调用方法。If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 如果控件为空，或者无法检索数据源，则提供在设计时用来呈现控件的标记。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.

returns.span: 用于在设计时使用空的数据源来呈现该控件的标记。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类检索用于在设计时呈现控件之前绑定目的的示例数据。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 空的设计时控件呈现为包含类型名称和控件名称的占位符。The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The that was thrown.

summary.span: 提供发生错误时用于在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 用于发生错误时在设计时呈现控件的标记。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 错误设计时控件呈现为一个占位符，包含的类型名称、 控件名称和描述错误的消息。The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

param.name: component
param.span: 由 派生的实现 的控件。

span.span: A control derived from , which implements .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主调用方法准备好使用设计器来呈现派生自的控件时类。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the class. 方法及其基方法会配置属性并设置连接所需的设计器操作的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(bool forceUpdateView) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataSourceChanged (forceUpdateView As Boolean)

param.name: forceUpdateView
param.span: 强制更新设计时标记时为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, .

summary.span: 关联 对象的数据源发生更改时被调用。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法连接到当前的数据源。The method connects to the current data source. 如果当前的数据源不同于向其控件之前已连接，数据源或`forceUpdateView`是`true`，关联的控件重绘设计图面上。If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.

para.span: 重写方法来执行关联控件的数据源更改时所需的其他操作。

span.span: Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when the data source of the associated control changes.

para.span: 如果你重写方法，调用基实现之前执行其他处理。

span.span: If you override the method, call the base implementation before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 关联 对象的数据源加载新架构时被调用。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object loads a new schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将处理事件，将引发该事件的关联的控件绑定到源数据的架构时更改。The method handles the event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes. 重写方法来执行提供新的架构时所需的其他操作。Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 该 包含要筛选的属性。

span.span: The containing the properties to filter.

summary.span: 供设计器用于在“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自的方法方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加或删除属性从**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 有关类，阴影的控件属性。For the class, the shadows the property of the control. 它使的属性数组的副本，然后将这些属性添加到隐藏的属性。It makes a copy of the attribute array of the , and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property. 它将设置的隐藏特性属性`false`除非属性的控件的属性已设置为`true`。It sets the attribute of the shadowed property to `false` unless the attribute of the property of the control is already set to `true`.

para.span: 重写方法可以将属性添加到或更改的设计时属性集合中的属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowCreateDataSourceDialog (System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner controlDesigner, Type dataSourceType, bool configure, out string dataSourceID);

.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult ShowCreateDataSourceDialog(class System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner controlDesigner, class System.Type dataSourceType, bool configure, [out] string& dataSourceID) cil managed

public: static System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult ShowCreateDataSourceDialog(System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner ^ controlDesigner, Type ^ dataSourceType, bool configure, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % dataSourceID);

span.span: A reference to this designer.
The type of data source.

param.name: configure
param.span: 设置为 则启用配置的编辑，或设置为 则禁用配置编辑。

span.span: to enable editing of the configuration, or to disable configuration editing.
The ID of a control on the page.

summary.span: 在设计宿主中，（比如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]），会显示一个对话框来协助用户创建数据源。

span.span: In a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], displays a dialog box to assist the user in creating a data source.
A object.
